Title: Karaikudi Kaalai logo, song and jersey released
Content: In a colourful function, the logo, song and jersey of Karaikudi Kaalai, one of the eight teams in the Tamil Nadu Premier League, was released here on Wednesday.The team is owned by Chettinad Apparels
Author: Special Correspondent
